title: The Quest for the Phantom Pearl
description: You and your crew aboard the Sea Serpent have discovered an old map leading to the legendary Phantom Pearl, a treasure said to grant its finder ultimate fortune. But the journey is perilous - through cursed waters, rival pirates, and ancient traps. Only the bravest and cleverest crew can claim the prize.
objectives: Decipher the mysterious map and determine the first destination
Navigate through the Siren's Strait without losing the ship to the treacherous rocks
Find and explore the abandoned island marked with the skull symbol
Recover the ancient compass hidden in the island's temple ruins
Evade or confront the rival pirate crew hunting the same treasure
Use the compass to locate the underwater cave entrance
Solve the riddles guarding the inner chamber of the cave
Claim the Phantom Pearl and escape before the cave collapses
